General.Name: GERRY WEBER International AG
General.Description: GERRY WEBER International AG operates as a fashion and lifestyle company in Germany and internationally. It operates through three segments, Wholesale, Retail, and E-Commerce. The company engages in the design, production, and trading of ladieswear. It offers tops, halbarmshrits, T-shirts, pullover, cardigans, blusenshirts, tunics, sleeveless blouses, blazer, pants, dresses, skirts, jackets, and coats; accessories, such as bags and shawls/scarves; and shoes. The company provides its products under the GERRY WEBER, TAIFUN, and SAMOON brand names through retail stores, e-shops, and marketplaces. GERRY WEBER International AG was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Halle, Germany.
